Uses of Interface
particlesim.IParticle

Uses of IParticle in particlesim
 

Classes in particlesim that implement IParticle
 class ChargedParticle
          An implementation of the Particle interface for a simple charged particle.
 class ElecFieldParticle
          An implementation of the IParticle interface for a particle affected by electric fields
 

Fields in particlesim declared as IParticle
 IParticle[] DrawParticles.parts
          An array of particles to draw/run calculations on.
